title: TN Budget 2022: Will file report on actions taken over finance panel's recommendations, says finance min - India Today

description: The TN Finance Ministerâ€™s speech in the Assembly said that the state government will file a report on the actions taken based on the recommendations made by the 6th State Finance Commission. Here is a summary of all the important points.
